T03bsa033_u:655: māhāyānikabhāvanāmārgīyāryapudgalasantatisthā mahākaruṇā asyāḥ kṛpayā na śame sthitiritimārgajñatāyā upalakṣikā /
T03bsa033_u:657: māhāyānikasyāryasya sattvālambanā dharmālambanā nirālambanā ceti tisro mahākaruṇāḥ,
T03bsa033_u:659: traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt yā śrāvakādyagocaratvena viprakṛṣṭā bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā,
T03bsa033_u:667: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena spaṣṭamullikhitam tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:670: śrāvakādīnām adhvasamatājñānābhāvāt anityādyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ sanimittopalambhayogena kṛpāprajñāvaikalyāt dūrībhūtaṃ jinajananyā iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:676: asya lakṣaṇādīnāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samyak kṛtam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:679: mahākaruṇayā śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttaṃ māhāyānikaryāṇāṃ hīnayānajātīyam anityādyākārajñānam asya lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:680: “bodhisattvādīnāṃ tu utsāritabhāvābhiniveśabhrāntinimittānāṃ rūpādisarvadharmaparijñānameva tatsamatāparijñānamityataḥ samyagāsannībhāvo māturiti jñeyam /“
T03bsa033_u:688: asya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayāṃ kārikayā suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:692: mahākaruṇā śūnyatāprajñābhyāṃ viyuktā bhāvolambhasvabhāvā hainayānikī vastujñateti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:693: “sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:694: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāpi viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /“
T03bsa033_u:696: asya bhedo 'vadhiścetyubhau 'anupāyena dūratvam ' ityasmin prakareṇa yathā pradarśitau,
T03bsa033_u:699: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramupadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:707: mahākaruṇopāyena śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttā māhāyānikāryasantatisthā vastujñatā pratipakṣalakṣaṇātmikā /
T03bsa033_u:709: ubhāvapi pūrva 'upāyena avidūratā ' ityasmin prasaṅge yathāvarṇitau tathā jñātavyau /
T03bsa033_u:724: evaṃ kṛtvā yathoktau vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye /
T03bsa033_u:727: “śrāvakādīnāmevaṃ māturdūrībhāvenānuṣṭhānaṃ pratipakṣo 'pi san vastūpalambhaviparyāsapravṛttatvena bodhisattvānāṃ tyājyatvād vipakṣa iti” /
T03bsa033_u:729: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre sārdhadvayena kārikāgranthena savistaraṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:732: avikāro na kartā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
T03bsa033_u:736: sāṃvṛtike vastusvarūpe tadviśeṣe ca viparyāsapravṛttasya upalambhābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhūto hīnayānajātīyaḥ sattvayogaḥ prayoga iti lakṣaṇam
T03bsa033_u:752: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samādarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:757: pūrvokteṣu daśavidhaprayogeṣu pratisvaṃ catasraḥ amananā bhavantīti catvāriṃśadasyāḥ samatāyāḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:764: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
T03bsa033_u:768: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ darśamārgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttibhedena ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā evāsya ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavantīti /
T03bsa033_u:785: 11. upāyakauśalamityekādaśa dharmāḥ sarvākārābhisambodhamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:791: trisarvajñatāsambaddhānāṃ trisaptatyuttaraikaśatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttatvena vyavasthāpitaḥ satvayogaḥ sarvākārābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:805: ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyagupavarṇitam /
T03bsa033_u:807: sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṃgraheṇa trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ prayogavaiśiṣṭyam ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇamiti /
T03bsa033_u:813: caturāryasatyeṣu prathamataḥ trayāṇāṃ satyānāṃ pratyekaṃ catvāra iti dvādaśa,
T03bsa033_u:818: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ //
T03bsa033_u:822: nirodhasatyasya ṣoḍaśa ceti mārgajñatāyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad ākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:824: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam /
T03bsa033_u:825: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ //
T03bsa033_u:828: buddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā asādhāraṇā ekonacatvāriṃśacceti sarvākārajñatāyā daśottaraśatam ākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:834: jñānākārebhyaḥ pūrvam arthākārāḥ parijñātavyā iti prathamataḥ trisaptatyuttaraśatam arthākārā upadarśitāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:836: prayogāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre catasṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam /
T03bsa033_u:838: jñātṛjñeyayoḥ vastumārgākārāṇāṃ ca śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāsvarūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāniṣprapañcātmakaṃ jñānamevātra sākṣānnirdiṣṭasya prayogasya lakṣaṇamiti /
T03bsa033_u:839: athavā - trisarvajñatānāṃ yāvadākārāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayoga evātra nirdiṣṭaprayogasya lakṣaṇam
T03bsa033_u:840: yato hi 'kṛcchrāccireṇa prativodhataḥ ' ityanena nirdiṣṭaḥ sambhāramārgīyaḥ prayogo 'tra saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
T03bsa033_u:852: na ca svapne 'pi ṣaṭpāramitācaryāsu dūrībhāva iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ,
T03bsa033_u:861: tadyathā paramārthato guṇadoṣāṇāṃ vṛddhiparihāṇyadarśanena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṇānujñānāt avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ,
T03bsa033_u:870: tasmāt paramaratnasvabhāvāyā mātuḥ saṃvatsareṇa bahvantarāyatve 'pi likhanaṃ śīghrameveti avadhiprayogaḥ /
T03bsa033_u:872: guṇānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhenopadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:878: tathā hi - pāramitāyāṃ udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ mārakṛtavighnāḥ tathāgatānubhāvena vyāhanyanta iti māraśaktivyāghātaguṇaḥ,
T03bsa033_u:893: prayogāṇāṃ doṣā abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena upadarśitāḥ / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:921: amī viśatiḥ doṣāḥ pāramitāyāṃ pravṛttasya yogino 'ntarāyakarāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:954: lakṣaṇasya pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:955: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat /
T03bsa033_u:956: jñānaṃ viśeṣaḥ kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate //
T03bsa033_u:957: vistareṇa tu lakṣaṇānāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikabhiḥ samyag vihitam /
T03bsa033_u:965: kāritralakṣaṇāni ekādaśa svabhāvalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti lakṣaṇānāṃ bhedā vistareṇa ekanavatiḥ bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:967: jñanalakṣaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vistareṇa pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ vihitam /
T03bsa033_u:970: kleśaliṅgādayo vakṣyamāṇāḥ svabhāvā eva eteṣāṃ upalakṣakāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:975: sarvākārajñatāsaṃgṛhītāni jñānalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti tridhā bhedaḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1047: viśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre samyagupadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1055: māhāyānīyadarśanamārgīyakṣāntijñānakṣaṇāni ṣoḍhaśa śrāvakapratyekabuddhadarśanamārgasambaddhakṣāntijñānakṣaṇebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇīti ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavanti / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1056: duḥkhasatyālambanāni catuḥkṣaṇasaṃgṛhītāni kṣāntijñānāni kramaśaḥ acintyaviśeṣaḥ atulyaviśeṣaḥ,
T03bsa033_u:1071: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate /
T03bsa033_u:1080: kāritrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyagāveditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1081: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām /
T03bsa033_u:1086: hitasukhatrāṇādiprativiśiṣṭajñānaiḥ sattvaprayogāḥ parārthasampādanasādhanaiḥ yojyanta iti tāni kāritralakṣaṇānyucyante /
T03bsa033_u:1107: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvat sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1109: eteṣāṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇānāṃ svarūpapratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyag vihitam /
T03bsa033_u:1137: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti svabhāvalakṣaṇāni /
T03bsa033_u:1144: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam //
T03bsa033_u:1145: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1147: asya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1151: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādyārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalalakṣaṇo dharmābhisamaya evātra mokṣabhāgīyamiti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1163: svarūpataḥ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti trividhaṃ mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam /
T03bsa033_u:1168: saṃsārādīnavān mokṣaguṇāṃśa śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ romaharṣodgamāśrupātādayo bhavanti,
T03bsa033_u:1171: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ pratipāditam /
T03bsa033_u:1183: eṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena trividha iti dvādaśa bhedā bhavati /
T03bsa033_u:1194: avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghasya svarūpaṃ ekayā kārikayā abhisamayālaṅkāre proktam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1202: paraśca prābandhikabhāvanāmārgastha iti trividho bhavati avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃgha iti trayo 'sya bhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1206: asya samatāprayogasya lakṣaṇādim abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1210: pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāmapi sattāgrāhakavikalpaparikṣayāt śauddhabhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavaśamasamatāprayogasya lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1212: tisṛṇāṃ śuddhabhūmīnāṃ trīṇi jñānānyevāsya trayo bhedāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1216: prayogastāsya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā 'bhihitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1220: praṇidhānādikuśalamūlabalena svabuddhakṣetraṃ sattvabhājanalokātmakaṃ pariśodhitukāmasya śauddhabhūmikāni jñānānyeva kṣetraśuddhiprayogasya lakṣaṇāni /
T03bsa033_u:1226: asyopāyakauśalaprayogasya svarūpādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1257: , ityaṣṭau dharmā mūrdhābhisamayamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1260: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani /
T03bsa033_u:1264: asyoṣmaṇo mūrdhaprayogasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1268: svapne 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnābhatvadarśanādiṣu dvādaśaliṅgeṣu anyatamasya prāptyā vyavasthāpitaḥ prathamo nirvedhabhāgīya ūṣmā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1271: nairātmyālambanāyā vidarśanāyāḥ prāptimārabhya bhūmiprāptiparyantamasya sīmā bhavati /
T03bsa033_u:1273: asya mūrdhākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1277: puṇyavivṛddhyādiṣoḍaśavivṛddhīnāṃ pūrṇatayā māhāyāniko dvitīyo nirvedhabhāgīyo mūrdhā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1278: ayaṃ mūrdhā mūrdhaprayogaḥ mahāyānaprayogamārgīyo mūrdhaprayogaśceti samānārthakau /
T03bsa033_u:1284: asya nirūḍhyākhyamūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1289: anuttarā paripūriḥ nirūḍhyākhyastṛtīyo nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ kṣāntimūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1290: ayaṃ kṣāntyākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyānikaḥ prayogamārgīyakṣāntiprayogaśceti dvau samānārthakau /
T03bsa033_u:1294: yathā māhāyānikāyāḥ prayogamārgīyāyāḥ kṣānteravadhistathā asyāpi prayogasyāvadhirjñātavyaḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1296: asya agradharmākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1308: asya darśanamārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
T03bsa033_u:1310: darśanaheyāyāḥ sattāgrāhikāyā dṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣabhāvena vyavasthāpito māhāyānikaḥ satyābhisamayo darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam
T03bsa033_u:1311: ayaṃ darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyāniko darśanamārgaśca paryāyau /
T03bsa033_u:1313: heyadṛṣṭyā darśanaprahātavyānāṃ caturṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ catvāraḥ pratipakṣā iti catvāro 'sya prabhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1318: asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramabhihitam /
T03bsa033_u:1321: dṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpito māhāyāniko 'nvabhisamayaḥ bhāvanāmārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1323: bhāvanāheyānāṃ navānāṃ vikalpānāṃ sākṣāt pratipakṣabhūtā navānantaryamārgāḥ,
T03bsa033_u:1324: nava ca vimuktimārgā iti aṣṭādaśa asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya bhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1326: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasya sīmā bhavatīti /
T03bsa033_u:1330: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1339: avyavahitatvena sākṣādutpādakaḥ paryantayogaḥ ānantaryasamādhyākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1343: ekakṣaṇikāścatvāraḥ prayoga evāsya catvāro bhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1348: 'tra nirākarttavyā bhavantīti tāsāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ svarūpam
T03bsa033_u:1349: abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1352: prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1357: saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyayordvayoḥ svabhāvata ekatvalakṣaṇayoḥ agrahaṇarūpāḥ sammukhībhūtavikalpāḥ tadbījāni vā nirākarttavyā vipratipattaya iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1360: tathā hi - saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadhātvorabhāvatvena ālambanopapattauḥ sarvathā nīrūpatvād ālambanasvabhāvadhāraṇe,
T03bsa033_u:1373: svasāmānyalakṣaṇānupapattyā bhāvanāyāṃ ceti sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ saṃśayarūpāḥ ṣoḍaśa vipratipattayo bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1374: tāḥ yathāsambhavamubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākṛtya samyak sarvathā niścayamutpādya kalyāṇakāmaiḥ bodhisattvairānantaryasamādhiradhigantavyaḥ
T03bsa033_u:1377: etāḥ ṣoḍaśāpi vipratipattayo kalpanātmikā śabdātmikā ceti dvayorantarbhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1378: dvayoḥ satyayorekamālambya yadaparaṃ nirākaroti tad abhiniveśātmakaṃ jñānameva kalpanātmikā vipratipattiḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1379: dvayoḥ satyayorekaṃ nimittīkṛtya yā aparaṃ nirākaroti sā vāk śabdātmikā vipratipattiaravaseyā /
T03bsa033_u:1384: ānupūrvikābhisamayasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre saṃkṣepataḥ kārikāśena kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1386: vistaratastu tasya lakṣaṇādikamanayā ekayā kārikayopanyastam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1387: dānena prajñayā yāvad buddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā /
T03bsa033_u:1390: sarvākārajñatāditrisarvajñatākārān adhigatān anupūrvīkṛtya prajñābhāvanayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ ānupūrvikaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1395: yo 'dhigamaḥ sa ānupūrvikābhisamayastrayodaśavidha ityasya trayodaśa bhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1400: ekakṣaṇābhisambodhasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1404: adhigatatrisarvajñatākāreṣu svabhyastasteṣāmeva kṣaṇenaikenādhigamarūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1415: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā parīdīpitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1423: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā samyagabhihitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1427: yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣakalaṅkāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatāvasthā śuklasvabhāvā jātā,
T03bsa033_u:1428: tadā ekasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ (prajñāpāramitā)
T03bsa033_u:1433: asya svarūpādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1439: alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti saṃkleśavyavadānarūpāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmekenaiva kṣaṇena
T03bsa033_u:1443: asyādvayalakṣaṇasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1447: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmīlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
T03bsa033_u:1448: tadā sarve 'pyevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaiva kṣaṇena paśyati,
T03bsa033_u:1455: aya ityadhigama ityevaṃ antimakāle dānādisarvānāsravadharmāṇāmaviparītaḥ samyak prativedhaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha ityucyate /
T03bsa033_u:1460: vipākabhūtasya dharmakāyasya saṃkṣiptanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitaḥ / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1466: sambhāradvayasaṃcayabalena prāptāḥ paryantaguṇā eva phalabhūto dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1474: asya svābhāvikakāyasyopapādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1475: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1484: asya jñānakāyasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitam /
T03bsa033_u:1486: yāvajjñānaṃ yathāvajjñānaṃ cāpekṣya sākṣātkāri paryantajñāna jñānadharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1489: buddhabhūmau anāsravajñānānāmekaviṃśatiḥ jñānavargā evāsya ekaviṃśatiḥ prabhedāḥ / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1525: sambhogakāyasya svarūpavarṇanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1529: sthānakāyaparivāradharmakālākhyaiḥ pañcabhirviniyatairvirśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ sambhogakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1535: ayaṃ sambhogakāyo buddhabhūmau akaniṣṭhaghanavyūhakṣetre eva kevalaṃ bhavati /
T03bsa033_u:1537: kāyasyāsya nairmāṇikasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayā ekayā samyagupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
T03bsa033_u:1538: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam /
T03bsa033_u:1539: ā bhavāt so 'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ //
T03bsa033_u:1542: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti,
T03bsa033_u:1543: asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho 'vasātavyaḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1550: imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni /
T03bsa033_u:1554: gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1557: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe //
T03bsa033_u:1578: vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate /
T03bsa033_u:1582: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ
T03bsa033_u:1583: maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ-sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya
T03bsa033_u:1588: sarve 'mī jananīnibandhanakṛtād bījānmayāptācchubhāt sarvākāravarā bhavantu niyataṃ kāyatrayaprāpiṇaḥ //
